name: The Bass Awards
description:
Two years after the wildly popular 2017 Bass Awards, that tragically ended with the death of their host, murmurs of a new edition spread once more.

The Bass Awards are a series of ironic-but-not-really video game awards. This final volume can be enjoyed by itself or paired with red wine.

Experience with the previous awards isn't necessary.

Features include:

  • Photorealistic (stock) Backgrounds
  • 2+ Brand New Characters
  • Roughly two hours of raw text energy
  • No way to send me any money whatsoever

Built with ren'py.
